verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:31
verses.text: And Barzillai the Gileadite came down from Rogelim, and went over Jordan with the king, to conduct him over Jordan.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:32
verses.text: Now Barzillai was a very aged man, even fourscore years old: and he had provided the king of sustenance while he lay at Mahanaim; for he was a very great man.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:33
verses.text: And the king said unto Barzillai, Come thou over with me, and I will feed thee with me in Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:34
verses.text: And Barzillai said unto the king, How long have I to live, that I should go up with the king unto Jerusalem?
